Package ch.pschatzmann.stocks.execution

Class StrategyExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.stocks.execution.StrategyExecutor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class StrategyExecutor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Translates a trading strategy into buy and sell orders. This version is based on the buy and sell signals from ta4j
    Author:
    pschatzmann
